key_risks: Intense competition from streaming platforms like Spotify and Apple Music
Challenges in monetizing and integrating Pandora
Declining revenue trends and downward revised guidance
Substantial debt levels limiting financial flexibility
Regulatory risks related to FCC spectrum allocation
controversies: Negative market reaction to revised financial guidance
Complexities in Pandora acquisition and integration
social_issues: Leadership changes raising questions about continuity in legal and regulatory compliance
governance_issues: High debt levels and financial flexibility concerns
